title: Nashor's hurricane (New item concept)
body:
Nashor’s hurricane

**Stats**

~~40 AP~~ 30 AP

~~30% attack speed~~ 40% attack speed

0 magic penetration (can be adjusted later if too weak)

Unique passive (Wind’s fury) - Auto attacks spread to nearby enemies spreading on hit effects (does not stack with runaan's/ can not purchase both like ravenous hydra and titanic hydra)

Unique passive – Auto attacks deal an additional ~~(15+5% AP)~~ (15+2% AP) damage on hit and apply corruption. Abilities detonate corruption dealing  ~~(15+5% AP)~~ 2 per level + 5% AP damage.  (although most on hit champions AP only have single target abilities so possible corruption can have a chain detonation effect)

**Items purpose / niche **

To provide mages with on hit effects spreading like runaan's hurracane without having them invest in a pointless stat (critical strike chance). It also gives some ok stats for on hit mages to use and is tailored to their needs. The passive detonation with abilities lets them spell weave and gives them a nice little boost of AOE damage and will probably look really pretty. It will give on hit mages more to do without giving them too much insane broken damage.

------------------------------------------------

Patch 101 (28/03)

Unique passive on hit damaged lowered to 15 + 2%AP from 15+ 5% AP
Damage on proc changed from 15+ 5%AP per level to 2 per level +5 AP damage
AP lowered to 30 AP
Attack speed increased to 40%

I feel the stats are kind of weak enough for it to have an op passive

Udyr is melee can't use it its an extremely niche for AP auto attackers.

Doesn't matter. That passive Witt 5% Ap scaling more than makes up for it's slightly week stats. When your talking about champions who can get up to 2 Attack speed 5% ap is a lot. And making it proc on multiple targets. You've just added a nashors and hurricane together
Theres always room for nerfs just like an AP AS item, i could possibly take off the 5 AP ratio on the autos

Sorry dude I just don't think it has a place in league. It's only ever gonna be good for a very very small number of champions. Not to mention you've basically just added the runnans passive to the nashors. 

It's doesn't really add anything. The reason you invest in a 'pointless' stat is for the trade off wave clear
I think its also just aimed at AD carries with the crit chance
